data.description:
Welcome to VeriPark NFT Gallery and Woodgrove Bank virtual branch, a cutting-edge virtual demo environment, powered by VeriPark on Meta Quest VR store. Here, you'll be able to experience the future of banking in a fully immersive virtual world. You will be able to explore VeriPark NFT gallery and discover one-of-a-kind digital artworks that will elevate your collection. And when you're ready to make a purchase, Woodgrove`s “buy now, pay later” promotion makes it easy to own a piece of NFT art. 
Please note that this is a virtual demo environment, not a real bank, where you can experience the possibilities of virtual banking and NFTs. This environment is powered by Microsoft & VeriPark technology, providing a glimpse into the potential of virtual banking.
Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to explore the potential of the metaverse in Banking industry.
VeriPark is a global solutions provider enabling financial institutions to become digital leaders with its Intelligent Customer Experience suite built on Microsoft’s cloud platforms and Microsoft Dynamics 365. With offices located in 15 countries across the globe, VeriPark is helping financial institutions to enhance their customer acquisition, retention, and cross-sell capabilities by providing proven, secure and scalable Customer Engagement, Omni-Channel Delivery, Branch Automation, Loan Origination and Next Best Action solutions.

changelog.change_log: New shaders added for optimization on gallery scene
